resources.string: 1. after installing SHINE download and install Adobe Lightroom app from Google play as well
Note!Without installation of Adobe Lightroom you cannot use the presets.
contact us and suggest your preset
Watch a video ad to unlock this Preset
2. choose a preset in SHINE and tap the DNG button.after see AD you`ll see a caption \'Adding a photo to All Photos Album\'. you will also get a success notification.
3. Then open lightroom and open the preset.Click on this icon and it open s a menu for you.Then click on Copy Setting
4. Then open your photo and click on Paste Setting.
5. That`s how it`s easy to create an awesome photo
How to Save Preset in Lightroom Forever
To fast apply the presets you copied before,save them as follows:
1. In the right upper corner ,tap a button:Choose \"Create preset\".
2. Write preset name in \'Preset Name\' field and mark all items,except of \'tools\',\'option\'and\'geometry\' (as on photo):
to apply this preset to your photo in the future ,follow:
choose one of the saved presets from the list and apply it to your photo in one click.
you can save all copied presets in the same way to avoid copying the setting all the time.
All presets will be saved in the \'User Presets \' folder.we recommend:name your presets in the same way as in the app.
